caption.p: Chest CT images of a 44-year-old woman. The RT-PCR test was positive. a Axial thin-section chest CT images show minimal ground-glass opacities (GGO) in the subpleural distribution. b, c Images show progressive GGO, mixed GGO and consolidation in the bilateral lung. d Images show thinned GGO, indicating absorption in the bilateral lung. e Images show complete absorption and a normal lung
